channel.title: Homespun Bloggers Radio
channel.description: Opinions, music and more from the Homespun Bloggers.

item.title: Homespun Bloggers Radio, Show #11
item.description:
Homespun Bloggers Radio Show #11
Segments include "The London Report", "Tribute to 'Mama Bear' and "Digital Music Distribution" (Andrew Ian Dodge, "Dodgeblogium"), "Prepackaged Solutions" (Jay Dean, "The Radical Centrist" and "The Bird's Eye View"), and "The Hunter Resolution Post-Mortem" (Doug Payton, "Considerettes").

item.title: Homespun Bloggers Radio, Show #10
item.description:
Homespun Bloggers Radio Show #10
Segments include "Welcome" (Tom Carroll, "MuD&PHuD"), "The London Report" and "Searching" (Andrew Ian Dodge, "Dodgeblogium"), "HBR and Podcasting" (Doug Payton, "Considerettes"), "Between the Lines on the Bird Flu" (Derek Gilbert, "Weapon of Mass Distraction"), and "California Bans Phishing" (Amelia Latella).

item.title: Homespun Bloggers Radio, Show #9
item.description:
Homespun Bloggers Radio Show #9
Segments include "Cry Freedom" (Andrew Ian Dodge, "Dodgeblogium"), and "Federal Response to Hurricane Katrina" (Doug Payton, "Considerettes").

item.title: Homespun Bloggers Radio, Show #8
item.description:
Homespun Bloggers Radio Show #8
Segments include "Getting a New Constitution" (Bob James, "CrosSwords"), "China's Human Rights" and "NARAL Attacks John Roberts" (Doug Payton, "Considerettes"), "London Bombings Aftermath" (Andrew Ian Dodge, "Dodgeblogium").

item.title: Homespun Bloggers Radio, Show #7
item.description:
Homespun Bloggers Radio Show #7
Segments include "Saying Goodbye to Mike Reed" (Juli, "Dagney's Rant"), "Sweeping Powers of the Kelo Decision" (Bob James, "CrosSwords"), "A Not-So-Conservative Conservative Party" (Andrew Ian Dodge, "Dodgeblogium"), and "What To Do About the Kelo Decision" (Tom Carrol, "MuD & PHuD").

item.title: Homespun Bloggers Radio, Show #6
item.description:
Homespun Bloggers Radio Show #6
Segments include "The Return of Zudfunck" (Jim Kertaugh, Zudfunck), "To Engage or Not To Engage China" (Doug Payton, "Considerettes"), and "Yet Another Inappropriate 'Nazi' reference" (Andrew Ian Dodge, "Dodgeblogium"),

item.title: Homespun Bloggers Radio, Show #5
item.description:
Homespun Bloggers Radio Show #5 (Special "Social Security" Edition)
Segments include "Social Security as It Was Intended (Jay Dean, "The Radical Centrist"), "How Did We Live Before Social Security?" (Derek Gilbert, "Weapon of Mass Distraction"), "Changing Their Stories" (Doug Payton, "Considerettes"), and "Homespun Bloggers Round-up on Social Security" (Jay Dean, "The Bird's Eye View").

item.title: Homespun Bloggers Radio, Show #4
item.description:
Homespun Bloggers Radio Show #4
Segments include "California's Stormy Political Scene" (Jay Dean, "The Radical Centrist"), "Advancing British Libertarianism" & the song "Waking Up Blues" (Andrew Ian Dodge, "Dodgeblogium"), and "Ignoring Contrary News" (Derek Gilbert, "Weapon of Mass Distraction").

item.title: Homespun Bloggers Radio, Show #3
item.description:
Homespun Bloggers Radio Show #3
Segments include "Audio Fisking of John Kerry, part 2" (Doug Payton, "Considerettes"), "Letter from the Front Lines" (Paulie, "The Commons at Paulieworld"), and "Tsunami in the Pacific (Mike Reed, "Bunker Mulligan").

item.title: Homespun Bloggers Radio, Show #2
item.description:
Homespun Bloggers Radio Show #2
Segments include "Christmas Intolerance" (Marty Grove, "Never Sway"), "Audio Fisking of John Kerry, part 1" (Doug Payton, "Considerettes"), and "Silent Night" (Mike Reed, "Bunker Mulligan")

item.title: Homespun Bloggers Radio, Show #1
item.description:
Homespun Bloggers Radio Show #1
Segments include "What is Homespun Bloggers Radio" (Doug Payton, "Considerettes"), "Welcome to Homespun Bloggers Radio" (Tom Carroll, "MuD & PHuD"), "How did John Kerry lose?" (Marty Grove, "Never Sway"), and "A Tale of Two Internet Fundraisers" (Doug Payton, "Considerettes").
